00060 /*===========================================================================
00061  *      Description :   Multiple level symbol table.
00062  *==========================================================================*/
00063 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00064 #include <config.h>
00065 #include <library/c_symbol2.h>
00066 
00067 static int scope[C2_MAX_SCOPE];
00068 static int scope_id[C2_MAX_SCOPE];
00069 static int next_scope_id = 0;
00070 static int n_scope = 0;
00071 
00072 int
00073 C2_init_scope (int num_scope, int s_global, int s_local)
00074 {
00075   int i;
00076   scope[0] = C_open (s_global, C_MATCH_BY_AND_TYPE);
00077   for (i = 1; i < num_scope; i++)
00078     scope[i] = C_open (s_local, C_MATCH_BY_AND_TYPE);
00079   for (i = 0; i < num_scope; i++)
00080     if (scope[i] == -1)
00081       {
00082         C_assert (0, "C2_init_scope: failed to open table");
00083         return 0;
00084       }
00085   next_scope_id = 0;            /* start from a fresh scope counter */
00086   n_scope = 0;                  /* start from the global scope */
00087   C2_scope_in ();               /* activate global level */
00088   return 1;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void
00092 C2_kill_scope_above (int n)
00093 {
00094   int i;
00095   if (n < 0)
00096     C_assert (0, "C2_kill_scope_above: argument can not be negative");
00097   if (n < n_scope)
00098     {
00099       for (i = n; i < n_scope; i++)
00100         {
00101           C_clear (scope[i]);
00102         }
00103       n_scope = n;
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void
00108 C2_reset_attribute (int n)
00109 {
00110   int i;
00111   if (n < 0)
00112     C_assert (0, "C2_reset_attribute: argument can not be negative");
00113   for (i = n; i < n_scope; i++)
00114     {
00115       C_clear_attr (scope[i]);
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 int
00120 C2_scope_in (void)
00121 {
00122   int i;
00123   i = n_scope++;
00124   if (i >= C2_MAX_SCOPE)
00125     C_assert (0, "C2_scope_in: too deep");
00126   C_clear (scope[i]);
00127   scope_id[i] = next_scope_id++;
00128   return scope_id[i];
00129 }
00130 
00131 int
00132 C2_scope_out (void)
00133 {
00134   n_scope--;
00135   if (n_scope < 1)
00136     C_assert (0, "C2_scope_out: underflow");
00137   return scope_id[n_scope - 1];
00138 }
00139 
00140 int
00141 C2_find_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer * value, Pointer * ptr)
00142 {
00143   int i, s;
00144   s = 0;
00145   for (i = n_scope - 1; (i >= 0) && (!s); i--)
00146     {
00147       s = C_find (scope[i], name, type, value, ptr);
00148     }
00149   if (s)
00150     return scope_id[i];
00151   else
00152     return -1;
00153 }
00154 
00155 int
00156 C2_update_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer value, Pointer ptr)
00157 {
00158   int i;
00159   i = n_scope - 1;
00160   C_update (scope[i], name, type, value, ptr);
00161   return scope_id[i];
00162 }
00163 
00164 int
00165 C2_find_local_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer * value, Pointer * ptr)
00166 {
00167   int i, s;
00168   i = n_scope - 1;
00169   s = C_find (scope[i], name, type, value, ptr);
00170   if (s)
00171     return scope_id[i];
00172   else
00173     return -1;
00174 }
00175 
00176 int
00177 C2_update_local_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer value, Pointer ptr)
00178 {
00179   int i;
00180   i = n_scope - 1;
00181   C_update (scope[i], name, type, value, ptr);
00182   return scope_id[i];
00183 }
00184 
00185 int
00186 C2_find_global_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer * value, Pointer * ptr)
00187 {
00188   int s;
00189   s = C_find (scope[0], name, type, value, ptr);
00190   if (s)
00191     return scope_id[0];
00192   else
00193     return -1;
00194 }
00195 
00196 int
00197 C2_update_global_symbol (char *name, int type, Integer value, Pointer ptr)
00198 {
00199   C_update (scope[0], name, type, value, ptr);
00200   return scope_id[0];
00201 }
00202 
00203 int
00204 C2_forall (C_Function fn)
00205 {
00206   return C_forall (scope[n_scope - 1], fn);
00207 }
00208 
00209 int
00210 C2_forall_global (C_Function fn)
00211 {
00212   return C_forall (scope[0], fn);
00213 }
